body:
All Versions

  • User Profile: Users can now modify name, address and other user profile information.
  • Activity Stream: Fixed bug not allowing download files from Activity Stream
  • Rank Networks Survey: Fixed bug that prevented certain clients from sending a survey by Share vie Email
  • Provider List: Maintaining scroll position in provider list when navigating back from provider profile
  • Provider List: Column headings are now anchored during scrolling
